WRITING.TEXT: Who actually is Lena Dunham? I've seen a lot of people hate on her, I just never got why.
Does the "Parabellum" mean that it fires the 9mm Luger round?
You do know that they make fun of everybody there? Just search for images of "Merkel Rosenmontag" and you will find floats where she is ridiculed.

My point is that a lot of Trump supporters seem to be talking about the issues of other countries they know next to nothing about but act like they're experts. And yes, of course this also happens in Europe when talking about the US, many talk shit about America when they really don't a thing about what's going on over there.
Not that guys like you ever left your country anyway...
I'm curious, what are your sources on this? Do you live in Germany? Do you read german news?
Has anyone of you actually ever been to Germany?

WRITING.TITLE: Der Schulzzug ist auf der Titelseite von SPON angekommen!
